you
hi I'm Peter Winn welcome to blood sugar
magic or BSM in today's episode I'll
demonstrate health habits freestyle
light meter works now please note that
this is not an instructional video it
does not replace reading the manual or
speaking to your diabetes professional
if you'd like to see my full review of
the abbot's freestyle light meter then
click on the video that's on screen now
the Freestyle like lancing device comes
with a meter it's your basic lancing
device accepts that it's shorter and it
has a mechanism to check the use lan set
to use separate the two halves insert
the lancets remove the Lancet top and
put together the two halves there are
four penetration settings two prime pull
the back tab until it clicks - lance
press the button to remove the use
lenses with the lancing device upside
down pull back the white tabs on each
side of the lancets the landset should
fall out a use landset can also be
removed manually its lid can be used as
a protective cap if needed be gentle
when doing this it clicks onto the land
set so I can pull it out without
freaking myself with a meter off insert
the test strip the false screen will
display followed by a flashing drop and
strip apply a drop of blood to one
sample area only when the meter beeps
and dashes appear remove the finger a
reading appears in about five seconds
and is stored in the memory with the
date and time remove the test strip and
the meter will switch off one thing to
remember is once one side of the test
strip has been used the other side
cannot be used for another test
one useful feature is that if enough lad
has not been applied the first time more
blood can be added to the initial sample
if lines do not appear on screen in five
seconds after applying blood than the
sample may be too small if this happens
the user has 60 seconds from the first
application to add more blood for the
same sample tip as the original sample
another handy feature is the ability to
test in low-light the procedure is the
same except a button needs to be pressed
insert the test room when the flashing
drop and strip appear or count to three
if you can't see the screen press the
light button a light will illuminate the
test trip area apply blood to the sample
tube as usual the screen light will come
on and a reading will appear
to use the backlight to see the screen
press em to turn on the meter then press
the light button start with the meter
off press em the seven days average will
appear press C for the forty days
average press C again for the thirty
days average from the 30 days average
screen press seen the most recent
reading in the memory will show pressing
C or M from here or scroll forwards or
backwards through your past results in
the memory
thank you for watching blood-sugar magic
BSM if you'd like more information on
diabetes then please have a look at our
videos on those topics
